Description:
Model
Brand: Corsair
Series: MP600 ELITE
Model: CSSD-F1000GBMP600EHS
Device Type: Internal Solid State Drive (SSD)
Used For: Consumer


Details
Form Factor: M.2 2280
Capacity: 1TB
Memory Components: 3D TLC
Interface: PCI-Express 4.0 x4, NVMe 1.4
Protocol: NVMe 1.4
Controller: PS5027-E27T
Encryption: AES 256-bit encryption


Performance
Max Sequential Read: Up to 7000 MBps
Max Sequential Write: Up to 6200 MBps
4KB Random Read: Up to 1,000,000 IOPS
4KB Random Write: Up to 1,000,000 IOPS
Terabytes Written (TBW): 600TB
MTBF: 1,600,000 hours
HeatSink: Yes


Features
Features: The CORSAIR MP600 ELITE PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe M.2 SSD with Heatsink uses PCIe Gen4 technology to achieve impressively fast sequential read speeds of up to 7,000MB/sec and sequential write speeds of up to 6,500MB/sec. High-density 3D TLC NAND flash memory offers an ideal mix of performance and endurance, while the industry standard M.2 2280 form factor makes installation in your PC straightforward. If you’re looking for impressive storage performance, the MP600 ELITE delivers blazing fast Gen4 speed in a neat, convenient package backed by a reassuring five-year warranty.


Environmental
Power Consumption (Idle): < 50 mW
Power Consumption (Active): Active Read: 5.6W
Active Write: 8.5W
Operating Temperature: 0°C ~ +70°C
Storage Temperature: -40°C ~ +85°C
Operating Humidity: 40°C 90% RH
Max Shock Resistance: 1500G
Max Vibration Resistance: 20Hz~80Hz/1.52mm


Dimensions & Weight

Width: 23.00mm
Depth: 80.00mm
